message: Hi Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to let it go for $110.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can do $105, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $98. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob. I can do $108, but I really need to make a profit on this deal.
I'm still not sure I'm comfortable with that price. I was thinking more along the lines of $102. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm getting a bit frustrated that we're not meeting in the middle, Bob. I can do $109, but I'm starting to think we're getting close to the point where I should just sell it to someone else.

I understand you're getting frustrated, but I'm still trying to make a deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $109 and my last offer of $102, so I'll offer $105.50. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob, but I'm still not sure I'm getting the price I want. I can do $112, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.

I've already offered you a price of $105.50, and you've rejected it. I'm not willing to go any higher than that. I think we've gone back and forth long enough. I'm going to have to consider buying the product from John for $120.
